title: Ig highly sensitive to i rate, large crowding out

content.question: The crowding out effect of government spending will be large if

choices.label: investment is highly sensitive to changes in the interest rate
consumption is highly sensitive to changes in wealth
money demand is highly insensitive to changes in income
it takes a long time for changes in government spending to cause a change in equilibrium income
the long-run aggregate supply curve is horizontal

content.answer: investment is highly sensitive to changes in the interest rate

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
